channel.title: Millennial Techie on MT
channel.description: Recent content in Millennial Techie on MT

item.title: Python Flask for Beginners
item.description: If you are developing a web application in Python, chances are you’re leveraging a framework. This can be Flask, Django, FastAPI or any other similar frameworks. These frameworks are basically a collection of packages or modules which allows developers to write a web app without handling low-level details like protocols, sockets, etc. So in this article we’ll develop a web app with Python Flask using SQLite3 as the database. But first let’s see how it has become so popular.

item.title: Webscraping using Beautifulsoup
item.description: The data-rich internet is now the ground for a lot of research, and web scraping gives you the leverage to collect the information that suits your needs. So, in this article we are going to use beautifulsoup - a popular python library for web scraping, and get some info on a familiar topic - the Covid-19 pandemic. But before we dive in, let’s clear up some FAQs. Why Web Scraping?
